body_html: Ok, thanks! FWIW, I do not know if cuFFT has its own fftshift these days, but there are implementations out there, e.g. https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2663515&dl=ACM&coll=DL from a few years ago when it definitely did not.
body_text: Ok, thanks!  FWIW, I do not know if cuFFT has its own fftshift these days, but there are implementations out there, e.g. https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2663515&dl=ACM&coll=DL from a few years ago when it definitely did not.
body: Ok, thanks!  FWIW, I do not know if cuFFT has its own fftshift these days, but there are implementations out there, e.g. https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2663515&dl=ACM&coll=DL from a few years ago when it definitely did not.
